By now, you should have received email notification from BackerKit about new digital downloads. We've released PDFs of the rules for the Car Wars Sixth Edition game . . . as well as the rules/credit sheets associated with many of the expansions. 
Enjoy the PDFs! We look forward to the day when all of us can hold the printed rules -- and finished games and expansions! -- in our hands and get the completed game on the table.
NOTE: Your BackerKit account will only have those files associated with your rewards. If your rewards package does not include a specific title, then you will not have the PDF for that title. Please email help@sjgames.com if you have any questions.

updates.update_userinfo: Car Wars Sixth Edition Tooling Update. Good News!
updates.update_content:
Thanks to a last-minute push by the team at GPI, we completed the tooling stage before the factory closed down for Chinese New Year. There are a few minor issues, but nothing that we cannot address during the manufacturing process.

Once the factory opens, we'll officially shift the project into the production stage. There will still be a number of checks (photos and video, so we can confirm that those minor issues are handled). We will not skip steps during this process or sign off on "meh, that kinda works" components. We get one chance to do this right, and we are going to do what it takes to make the game (and all of the expansions) the best we can manage. This means that although we are moving into production, we may find an item or two that requires another round of tweaks during manufacturing.

We know the one question everyone is asking comes down to: When will I get my game? We cannot answer that question until the factory opens and together we can nail down a final production schedule. One of the biggest risks of a Kickstarter campaign -- especially one of this size -- is that everyone gets to see the behind-the-scenes delays and issues that can plague a project. We don't assign a release date for many of our games until everything is at print (and often not until we have the tooling complete). This makes it easier to hit release dates, but even that has been a major challenge over the last year as the global pandemic disrupts everything.

We'll be back with a new update in early March after the factory opens and we work out a tentative production timeline. Once we have a production schedule, then we can start to plan a shipping schedule, but even that will be subject to the issues that are delaying shipping containers. (As an example, we had a 40' container canceled by the freight company last month. That tore a giant hole in our plans and was completely outside of our control.)

As always, thank you for your patience and understanding as we continue to push hard at wrapping up the game, accessories, and expansions.

updates.update_userinfo: Vehicle Guide Sample Spreads, Tooling Update
updates.update_content:
As we wait for the factory, below are two sample page spreads from the Car Wars Vehicle Guide. This add-on item is loaded with page after page of pre-designed cars, giving you an even faster way to start playing the game just as soon as you've opened the boxes and assembled your tools. Each design tells you which cards are needed to build the car*; the designs use cards from across the entire range of expansions that are being produced thanks to your support of this campaign.
* And the book even notes which set has the miniature of the car.
Tooling Update

The two vac trays for the core game have arrived!
With the Steve Jackson Games and GPI winter break coming up fast (both companies are closed starting Thursday), there's a chance we won't see the next round of samples until the first week of January. We'll have more pics to share as move closer and closer to the tooling finish line and prepare to officially move into final production.
- Phil Reed

Welcome to the Duck Sanctuary! 
Come enjoy the company of the ducks while visiting the different locations around the park.
In Ducks in Tow, you are walking around the park feeding the ducks their favourite food. When you feed them, they start following you and you must lead them to their favourite locations in the park.
When you successfully lead them to their favourite location, you take a photo with them and they waddle off to find their friends. Maybe you’ll see them again later as you continue your walk around the park.
You will be completing Location Cards that will gain you points at the end of the game. Once you have completed a few Location Cards, you might be able to claim a Formation Card, which will give you additional points at the end of the game.

campaign.story:
We believe the best communities are the ones that form around tabletop games. Whether it’s board games, roleplaying, cards, miniatures, or party games, bringing people together is what tabletop games do best.
You are invited to join Rick Rollz America as one of the Road Warriors, with host Rick Ankney on an epic road trip across America, visiting the incredible local game stores where communities gather, and talking with the amazing designers, artists, publishers and other creators who make the games we love. Together, Rick Rollz America will shine a spotlight on everything great about tabletop gaming and grow our communities by creating captivating videos that show what everyone else has been missing out on!
With Rick at the wheel, The ROAD WARRIORS will go behind the scenes with some of the biggest names in the tabletop industry and see how they’re bringing more games to more people. If we’re lucky (and Rick is famously lucky), we’ll even get some exclusive sneak previews of upcoming games!
Most importantly, the landmarks on our adventure are the pillars of every community: the FRIENDLY LOCAL GAME STORES! These bastions of games and gathering are where tons of communities are built, and this road trip will pay homage to the noble mission we share with them: to grow the ranks of tabletop gaming. The Road Warrior(s) will crash through the front doors and show off the space, staff, and selection of some of the greatest friendly local game stores across the country.
We would be honored to have your support as a member of Rick's Road Warriors on this epic road trip. We have some incredible loot for Road Warriors and Rally Point retailers to show they were one of the first to join us on this journey!
We are also very proud to be welcoming some fantastic companies that will be providing sponsorship in various forms over the course of Rick Rollz America. Here are some of those we have secured already!
PLEDGE LEVELS 
Tommy Rice - Author of THE LOK
As I roll across the USA we’ll be celebrating the best there is in gaming and geek culture! We see comic book characters like Superman, the Hulk, Thor… and we play games as Half-Giant Barbarians or Rogues that can leap over ANY wall with a crit! Well, why can’t we be those people ourselves? We can certainly try! So, as I roll to your city, I’m getting fit and who is helping me? One of our own gamers, my correspondent... the Iron Author… Tommy Rice!
Author of THE LOK, game designer for Mythic Games, bodybuilder, and former Pro-footballer,  Tommy is offering up some great things here to help our Road Warriors start their fitness journeys!
STRETCH GOALS
Who is your fearless Host?
You probably know Rick Ankney as the former host of innovative video series such as “Painting Happy Lil Minis”, “Board Games and Beyond”, and “Building Character.” Rick has been making tabletop content and spreading gaming for over 5 years, and was the Production Manager of Sapphire Studios: the home of Game Trade Media and Previews World Weekly for comics and games distribution companies.
HERE is a look at Painting Happy Lil Minis 
HERE is look at some Building Character episodes 
And HERE are a bunch of interviews from Origins Game Fair 2019: 
But did you know that Rick is a retired Navy Corpsman, was a bona-fide Roadie, and loves the open road? Rick Rollz America is an engaging project that combines his loves of tabletop, travelling, and talking to people who share his passions.
But he can’t do it alone! Together with your help, Rick will take the road less travelled (and many well-travelled roads, too) to personally visit the people who make the magic of tabletop gaming possible, and share it all with the world. Your support as a member of The Road Warriors means you’ll be there right beside him, fueling this year-long adventure of connecting communities across the country. 
The rubber hits the road on January 1st, 2020! Rick  will be out on the road through December, updating you all along the way via social media, so be sure to follow Rick Rollz America everywhere:
Facebook: www.facebook.com/rickrollzamerica
Twitter: @RickRollzAmerica
Instagram:  Rickrollzamerica
Twitch:@RickRollzAmerica
Youtube:Rick Rollz America
If you’ve made it this far, thanks a ton for learning about Rick Rollz America. If you’re a fan of tabletop games and value the communities that make this hobby so special, we would love your support. Even if you can’t pledge right now, sharing this campaign and our social media account links with your friends would mean the world to us.
Hopefully we’ll see you out there on the road and can get in some games together!
SHIPPING
Shipping will be collected in backerkit at the end of the campaign.  Shipping for most pledges (Minus Retailer Pledges)will be $10.00 or less in the USA depended on pledge level selected.

updates.update_userinfo: Starcadia Quest on CMON Comics - Vol. 1!
updates.update_content:
Starcadians, report in!
We hope you're all healthy and well!
At the beginning of the month we confirmed that all pledges were already shipped and we're very pleased to be receiving great feedback on the game!
If you're enjoying your Starcadia Quest adventures, today we come to you with more exciting news!
Starcadia Quest - Heart of a Star

Starcadians, report in!
We have received confirmation that the situation with the Poland pallet addressed on the previous update (update# 71) has been resolved and by now all hubs have shipped all pledges. Backers should have received their pledges, or at least a tracking number indicating that the pledge is on its way to you. Late Confirms are also being shipped out by the US hub. If you are still waiting on your pledge/tracking, please contact our Support Team at https://support.cmon.com/hc/en-us if you have not already done so.

updates.update_userinfo: EU Shipment Update, FAQ & Masmorra Heroes
updates.update_content:
Starcadians, report in!
We hope that everyone's been coping well, staying home and keeping healthy! In our last update, we identified an issue with deliveries in the EU highlighted to us by some backers. Since then, the hub has been investigating this issue with their couriers to determine the extent of the impact. It was reported back to us that the issue has been identified and seems to be limited to a consolidated pallet scheduled for Poland. This pallet is unfortunately considered to be lost in transit.

Starcadians, report in!
In our previous update, we stated that shipments were completed by the hubs. Although the information is accurate as hubs have shipped everything, reporting as complete, it does not take into account whether or not the packages have reached their destinations. 
We have been informed that European countries implemented regulations to limit, or even halt, shipping processes, and that unfortunately that is impacting the delivery of some of your pledges. Since the EU hub shipped the packages to the affected countries before such measures were implemented, these packages were already in transit (for example, delivery to destination country from the hub, or from customs to delivery partners for last mile fulfillment).

updates.update_userinfo: Final Delivery Update, Post Delivery Support & Extras Unboxing!
updates.update_content:
Starcadians, report in!
First off, we sincerely hope that everyone is safe and well, with all the changes that your respective governments have implemented to help combat this pandemic. It is a very unfortunate circumstance globally, and we can only hope that we will overcome this in the time to come. In the meantime, for backers who have received their pledges, we hope that you've been utilizing your time at home well by playing a ton!

Starcadians, report in!
In just a span of two weeks, we've seen the rapid spread of the pandemic with countries locking down and limiting movement. It is unfortunately a very uncertain time we live in and we sincerely hope that you and your loved ones are safe and well.
Kudos to the hubs and their delivery partners and personnel, who are adapting to the situation, and making sure the gears keep grinding. We ask that you bear with us just a little more if you have not yet received your pledges yet, as everyone involved in the delivery chain are likely working at a reduced capacity.

updates.update_userinfo: Delivery Update & Optional Buys Unboxing Pt. 1

We're very excited that some backers are already receiving their pledges. For those of you who are still waiting, we'd like to share the Core Box rulebook. This way you'll be ready to play as soon as the pledge gets to your door!

Rest of the World - The hubs have begun preparations, including the processing of the address changes. Backers should gradually begin to receive tracking numbers in the middle of February.

campaign.story:
Click here to order!
In the shadows of London, terrors stir. Powerful overlords conspire against one another, amassing hordes of monsters to do their bidding. Only one will claim the night and all within it as their prize.
Terrors of London is a competitive deck-builder with a Victorian horror theme. Each player will assume the role of an Overlord, each with a unique ability and two unique influence cards. Throughout the game players will add monsters from four different factions (Beasts, Mortals, Spirits, and Undead) to their deck, all of which can form hordes for powerful combos. Players will also procure marvelous relics, which they may immediately use for their unique abilities. The first player to reduce their opponent's life to zero wins the game and claims the night.
Watch Mark's gameplay video - Click Here!
                                                                                                                                                            Click to Read the Full Preview
                                                                                         Click to read the full preview!
Click to read the full preview!
Click to read the full preview!
                                                                                                         For more detailed information on how to play Terrors of London, please peruse our rules draft here and let us know if you have any questions!
The Victorian Noble pledge includes 4 new Overlords, all of which that use the terror token mechanism. This allows the Overlords to accumulate power for variable effects. It also features more monsters, relics, and starting cards to allow players to play up 2-4 players.
Terrors of London will be available in English, French, and German. You will select the desired language variant after the campaign in the pledge manager. 
All 31 stretch goals have been unlocked creating an expansion called Servants Of The Black Gate that is free to backers at the Victorian Noble level. See all the content unlocked below!
Backers can use the "Manage Pledge" button to add the specified amount from each add-on to their current pledge. Add-ons will be managed through the pledge manager CrowdOx at the end of the campaign. A link will be sent out to all backers who've pledged at least $1. From this link, backers will be able to edit their pledge and choose which add-ons they'd like. Backers can always increase their pledge through CrowdOx to get additional items.
Terrors of London the seventh campaign from Kolossal Games. While Kolossal is new to the industry, we hit the ground running, armed with the knowledge of industry best practices, experienced partners, and wonderful games. We're on track to deliver our first three games (Western Legends, Kami-sama, and Imperius) in record time. This campaign will be no exception. 
Our team is led and supported by industry and marketing experts. We have a machine that works, fueled by amazing games that are designed, developed, and illustrated by incredibly talented people. The game is easy to learn while providing interesting, diverse, and tense game play each game, combining familiar mechanisms in a unique, new way.
The game contains the incredible illustrations and graphic design of the very talented Ryan Pye.
We are committed to begin fulfillment to backers of this game before the it is made available in retail. Components and materials for the game are in the final stages of completion upon launch. All files will be uploaded to our manufacturing partner within one week of the campaign's ending. This ensures timely delivery to our backers.
By backing this game through this campaign, you will receive - at no extra cost Servants Of The Black Gate. We have many exciting and interactive goals planned for those who are backers of Kolossal's seventh official release! 
Kickstarter is the world's largest funding platform for creative projects. Every month, tens of thousands of people pledge millions of dollars to creative projects in dozens of categories.
A person who supports a project is called a "backer." The process of giving money to this project is called a "pledge."
In return for your pledge, we (the creators of the campaign) are able to offer "rewards," depending on the amount you pledge. For example, if you pledge $50 to help back the project, we'll offer you a copy of the game along with any stretch goals we achieve as soon as it is manufactured.
You can become a backer in just three easy steps:
Step 1: Read through the pledge levels and rewards we're offering in the right sidebar of this page.
Step 2: Click the large, green "BACK THIS PROJECT" button to the right of the trailer video at the top of this page.
Step 3: Enter your pledge amount, and complete the steps for filling in your information. This process takes just a few seconds! That's it! It's really that simple! Thank you for backing!
Once you've backed this project, we encourage you to share this page on social media platforms, such as Facebook and Twitter and share with your friends and family. Also, be sure to like Kolossal Games on Facebook and follow us on Twitter for real-time updates about this project, and find us on Instagram and BoardGameGeek for even more!
Please click on your desired reward level to see the shipping cost for your region. Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping is very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a small discount on ALL shipping, but no shipping is free.
This campaign includes Customs-Friendly delivery to the US, Canada, the UK, and the EU. Customs-Friendly means, if you live in any of these regions and have any additional charges for receiving your package, simply email kickstarter@kolossalgames.com a copy of your customs receipt and we will reimburse you via PayPal. Note: If your country is not in one of the above-mentioned regions, we cannot guarantee customs friendly shipping in these areas. (For example, Norway & Switzerland are not in the European Union.)
Click to Download!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While Terrors of London is our 1st Kickstarter project on Kolossal Mikro, it is the 7th from Kolossal Games, and our team has years of experience with publishing games. We have an impeccable track record of successfully delivering previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters in a timely fashion--if not sooner. Our commitment to building a strong, supportive community around Kolossal Games will enable us to also deliver this project on time and with the highest quality possible. That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. There are many steps in the process of manufacturing and fulfilling a game, many of which involve partnerships. Through careful and thorough planning, common mistakes can be avoided. However, possible delays can occur from circumstances beyond our immediate control. If such an issue is encountered, our team will adapt and no corners will be cut to course correct as needed. Our greatest obstacle is simply the funding capital to manufacture such an ambitious product of the highest quality capable. Your contribution makes this a reality!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Dear backers,
#Kolossal 2020
After our last few campaigns, we thought it was the time for our very first report to stakeholders! It is meant for you: backers, retail partners, and friends in gaming.
Through our projects, we learned, but most importantly, we listened to you, even when we did not always reply right away. We heard criticism and feedback, even when it was harsh.

Hi everyone,
We are really happy we were able to bring Terrors of London to life and to see so much positive feedback from you on this game.
This Kickstarter campaign has come to an end. This is our last post, we will not be posting any new updates here or monitoring the comments page. You can always reach out to us by opening a ticket through our Customer Care Team:   . If you have questions or concerns with any issues, please let us know and we will handle each request on a case-by-case basis. Having recently closed and answered a lot of tickets from previous Kickstarter campaigns we are ready to respond to yours in 3 working days.

Hello, all!
Terrors of London has reached doorsteps around the world! There are a few remaining Canadian backers who are awaiting their French language copies and we assure those backers that their games will arrive before the end of the month! Replacement cards are on their way as well. Things are moving forward!
As you get to know the game and start to play it more and more, we hope that you'll reach out and let us know what you think! What are your favorite combos? Who is the most powerful Overlord? We want to know what you think.

Dear Terrors of London backers,
We're reaching out to share some awesome news!
The new cards have been printed at our manufacturing center and they have arrived at our fulfillment centers in the US and in the EU. This means we will begin sending out replacement cards today!

updates.update_userinfo: Update on Terrors of London Cards
updates.update_content:
Dear Terrors of London backers,
We have received confirmation from the factory that they've unfortunately made a mistake with the production of some cards.  Our specs clearly state that the requested material is 300GSM as promised during the campaign. But it appears that a mistake was made during the material changeover in the machines at the factory, affecting less than 10% of the games. The German and French copies were not affected.

We are reaching out to inform everyone of two issues faced with the production process ofTerrors of London.
We have received confirmation from the factory that they've unfortunately made a mistake with the production of some cards. After checking our specs, the requested material is in fact 300GSM as promised. The sample that the Kolossal Team received and approved was correct. But it appears that a mistake was made and material was changed during material changeover in the machines at the factory, affecting some of the games produced. We have already looked into the possibility of reprinting the cards, but this would be a time-consuming process and we would rather address this issue immediately. Because we pride ourselves on making components of the highest quality, we would like to rectify this situation by offering card sleeves. This would reinforce the sturdiness of the cards as well as lengthen their playing life. You can reach out to us directly through our and we will ship a set of sleeves directly to you.

Hello Terrors of London Backers!
Games are arriving at backers' doorsteps around the world! We are very excited to get this game into your hands.
For those of you who have not received your game by July 26th, we encourage you to reach out to our Customer Care Center so that we can track down your shipment and provide you with detailed information on when to expect your game.

Hello Terrors of London Backers!
We wanted to do a quick follow-up to our June 20th update to address a mistake, and how we’re going to fix it!
Terrors of London has completed printing in all languages. Copies are being delivered to supporters in North America, Europe, Australia and Asian. All good stuff!

campaign.story:
This was the Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest: Back to the Dungeon! Our thanks to all the Backers who supported us in this Quest!

Use this link to access the Pledge Manager for Backer Rewards and Late Pledges! 
If you have any questions or comments please email kickstarter@alderac.com.
Thunderstone designed by Mike Elliott is a deckbuilding game of heroic adventure. We successfully Kickstarted Thunderstone Quest in the spring of 2017 and delivered it in the spring of 2018. This Kickstarter features Barricades Mode designed by Bryan Reese - rules and components for Solo & CoOp play, plus Quest 6: What Lies Beneath. 
You have four options to back this Kickstarter - Champion which consists of the Champion Reward from the 1st Kickstarter (but no new content), To The Barricades! which consists of just the new content in this campaign, Champion + Barricades! which combines both into one Reward, and Your Inventory is Full! which includes the Champion Reward, To the Barricades, 6 packs of Premium Sleeves, the Epic Thunderstone Add-on for Champion, and the Neoprene Mat.
Note for Expedited Backers: You can not drop your Expedited Pledge, switch to Your Inventory Is Full! and still get your Champion Expedited. If you have an Expedited Reward, don't change it. In the Pledge Manager there will be a special Add-on option just for you that will allow you to get all the contents of Your Inventory is Full! at the same price as the Reward listed in this Kickstarter, and keep your Expedited Status. We will ensure that every Expedited Backer who wants this Add-on will be able to get it regardless of the quantity ordered by other backers.

If you drop your Expedited Reward, we can't re-instate it. So don't drop it unless you really, really don't want your Champion Expedited.

Note for All other Backers (including $1 Backers): You will be able to upgrade your Reward in the Pledge Manager to Your Inventory Is Full! at the same price listed in this Kickstarter. QUANTITIES MAY BE LIMITED, so to guarantee that you get this Reward, select it now!
All Quests, including Quest 6: What Lies Beneath, and the Stretch Goals from this campaign, can be played in either Barricades Mode or normal Competitive Mode.
Follow the story of our Stretch Goals through Kickstarter Updates!
The Backers of this campaign successfully unlocked all the contents of Quest 7: Frostbite(*)! Quest 7 will join Quest 6: What Lies Beneath in the To The Barricades! portion of the Rewards for this Kickstarter.
The Premium To the Barricades Box!
(This packaging is for illustration purposes only. Actual box will differ in graphics and dimensions.)
With the completion of this Kickstarter the Thunderstone Quest product line will be quite large. 7 Quests, support for 6 players, and all the components of Barricades Mode, 8 plastic figures, plus Epic Thunderstone support and the Neoprene Mat.
Players who sleeve their cards will have filled the original Champions box. Therefore the To the Barricades box is being engineered to complement the Champion box.
In addition, we’re designing a plastic vac-formed tray that you can use to organize the various tokens and chits as you play. You can store those things in the tray in the box, and when it’s time to play you can remove the tray and put it on the table! The tray will be designed to accommodate all the various tokens & chits included in Champion + Barricades and a little bit of future proofing as well!
Currently we envision a box with the same dimensions as the Champion box. The two boxes will be graphically designed to compliment each other on your shelf.
We believe that when you sleeve all cards including Epic the two boxes together will have room for one or two additional Quests beyond Quest 7, although the storage of the Neoprene Playmat Add-on will affect how many cards can be stored in the boxes.
We expect to provide a suggested setup for managing all the cards and components across the two boxes when To the Barricades is delivered. Some people will prefer to organize their cards alphabetically by type. Others will organize them by Quest. We will have suggested setups for both.
The To the Barricades! Box will be Kickstarter Exclusive!
All unlocked Stretch Goals are included in To the Barricades! and Champion + Barricades! and Your Inventory Is Full!, but are not included in the Champion reward.
The Champion, Champion + Barricades! and Your Inventory is Full! rewards will include all the Kickstarter Exclusive Content from the 1st Kickstarter.
Kickstarter Exclusive content ("KSE") are game components and accessories that are available only to backers of AEG Kickstarters. Kickstarter Exclusive Content may be released in an alternate form more widely in the future (different art, different card titles, etc.).
Thunderstone is one of the most successful games AEG has ever published. The Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest and delivery of those rewards to our backers has enabled us to continue to develop the game and expand its scope. 
The major innovation for Thunderstone Quest is ... Quests! Each Quest consists of a selection of dungeon tiles and monster cards that create an engaging storyline. Each Quest includes rules for selecting Village and Dungeon cards to create a variety of Adventures. After you've mastered each Quest you use random setups of Quest cards to create new Dungeons and Villages - build your own Quests and Adventures!
The Champion Reward
Includes:
Really Big Box that holds all Champion content (even sleeved!)
5 Quests (each Quest includes approximately 245 cards and 6 Dungeon Tiles [except Ripples in Time which includes 4])
Over 130 base game cards (starting cards, quest cards, treasure cards, wound cards, key cards, randomizers & dividers)
Wilderness tile
Village game board
6 plastic Champion figures
140 wood tokens
5 six-sided dice
Rule book
Quest book
Kickstarter exclusives & extras including The Yellow Knight card & meeple (googly eyes not included)
Barricades Mode
One of the most requested features from the community was the ability to play the game solo or in a co-operative game. Our team has developed an extension to Thunderstone Quest called Barricades Mode to make that possible.
Includes:
6 Guardian Boards
[ In ongoing playtesting, Guardian Key cards were removed ]
20 damage chits
1 Damage chit bag
2 Marketplace overlay boards
8 Prestige Class boards
30 Prestige tokens
20 Guardian Dice (D12)
1 Threat Level wooden token
5 Barricade tokens
2 Additional Player Packs (all components required for adding a 5th and 6th player to both Competitive Mode and Barricades Mode)
Quest 6: What Lies Beneath
We area also presenting Quest 6: What Lies Beneath in this campaign. What Lies Beneath is designed to work with Barricades Mode to create a seamless storytelling experience. What Lies Beneath can be played in normal competitive mode too. All of the other Quests will be compatible with Barricades Mode.
Includes:
Approximately 245 cards
6 Dungeon tiles
Rulebook
Epic Thunderstone support cards
Full color storage box (will also hold components from Barricades Mode)
Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon is on Kickstarter so that we can bring all our current backers the content they've asked for quickly, and to create an opportunity for new backers to join the adventure and get access to all the Kickstarter Exclusive content from the first campaign.
The Stretch Goals in this campaign will be included in the To The Barricades! reward, and the Champion + Barricades!, and the Your Inventory Is Full! reward, but not the Champion reward.

(*) Quest 7: Frostbite is a working title and is subject to change.
The rules for Thunderstone Quest are available for download on the Thunderstone page at alderac.com. 
Update 15AUG:  We have produced a special Print & Play package for Barricades Mode that you can download and assemble at home. This is version 2.2 of the Barricades Mode system! If you own Thunderstone Quest, you'll be able to play Barricades Mode with this Print & Play!
Thunderstone Quest is a deckbuilding game where 2-4 players (or 1-6 players in Barricades Mode) compete to see who can score the most victory points when the game ends. In deckbuilding games your objective is to try to assemble the best possible deck to achieve the play strategy you prefer based on the options that are assembled for each game, and the random challenges you'll need to overcome.
Each player's deck represents a party of stalwart adventurers who will face and defeat the challenges of the Dungeon and will return to the Village to recover and re-equip.
On each turn you use your deck to generate a hand of cards, and you take actions based on the cards you drew. Sometimes you'll be in the Village buying new cards and using your resources. Sometimes you'll be in the Dungeon fighting monsters. And sometimes you'll do a little bit of both!
This new version of Thunderstone enhances the Dungeon mechanic introduced in classic Thunderstone. In Thunderstone Quest you'll be playing an Adventure which is comprised of a set of Dungeon tiles and a selection of monsters, treasures, and challenges that are themed to that Dungeon. You'll get the sense of a dramatic campaign as you grow stronger and finally confront the Guardian.
Depending on which cards you buy and which adversaries you defeat you will earn victory points. After the Guardian encounter is over, the player with the most victory points is the winner!
The competitive mode is designed for 2 to 4 people to play and it takes about 90 minutes to complete an Adventure. Barricades mode is designed for 1 to 6 people to play and will also take about 90 minutes to complete an Adventure.
Thunderstone Quest uses a lot of the rules from previous versions of Thunderstone but the cards from previous versions are not compatible.
The heroes must travel through time and into the arctic waste in search of a legendary artifact of great power. Follow along as their story unfolds with each new Stretch Goal!
Epic Thunderstone: 
Our 1st Add-On is a special set of over 200 cards that supports Epic-style play of Thunderstone Quest for the Champion and Champion + Barricades! Reward. If you backed the first Kickstarter and are backing this Kickstarter at the To the Barricades! level you can also order this Add-on.
The purpose of this Add-On is purely convenience. There is no content in the Epic Add-On that isn't already in the Champion Reward.
All new content (including Stretch Goals) in this campaign will be Epic-compatible and will have Epic support automatically included.
There are extensive answers about Epic Thunderstone and this Add-On in the FAQ. Please check to see if your question has already been answered before asking in the Comment thread.
Epic Thunderstone is a popular way to play created by players of Classic Thunderstone. In Epic Thunderstone you build a Village and a Dungeon draw pile using one of each of all your cards instead of playing with a pre-selected tableau. It's a way to see and use more of your card collection. Every game will be different.
Rules for Epic Thunderstone are included in the main rulebook.
This Add-On is a pre-built Epic Thunderstone deck ready for play. You won't have to subtract cards from your main play set to play Epic Thunderstone.
You'll need a full copy of Thunderstone Quest to play the Epic variant since there are cards, boards, tokens and other resources in the main game that are required to play Epic Thunderstone.
Neoprene Playmat
This is one of the most requested upgrades from the community and we're proud to announce that we'll be able to make Neoprene Playmats available as a part of this Kickstarter!
We've also heard the suggestions that the size of the Village board is larger than some groups prefer, and this Playmat also addresses that concern.
The Playmat will be sized so that it can fit within the To the Barricades box for this Kickstarter, rolled up. The length will be between 295 and 300 mm. The width is still undetermined; the graphics team will be redesigning the Village layout to accommodate the new size after the Kickstarter but the total will be smaller than the current Village board.
Premium Sleeves
Our 2nd Add-On are packs of Premium Sleeves. These Sleeves use the same plastic we used in the Mystic Vale sleeves.
The Sleeves are 66x91mm, 0.09mm thick (0.09mm = 90µ (or "microns" = 3.54 "mils")) and will fit Thunderstone Quest cards and cards that are the same size as Magic: The Gathering cards.
We are providing them in packs of 500 Sleeves for $15 per pack. You can order as many packs as you wish.
To sleeve every playable card in the Champion Reward and the Epic Add-On you would need 4 packs (2,000 Sleeves).
You will need 1 more pack to sleeve the new content in To the Barricades! and Champion + Barricades!.
The Champion box holds all the Champion content, plus the Epic Add-on cards sleeved. You will need to store future Quests (including Quest 6: What Lies Beneath and the stretch goals from this campaign) in their own boxes if you wish to sleeve them.
Adventurer Catch-Up Kit
Our third Add-on is a way for people who purchased the Adventurer Reward in the first Kickstarter to get the Quests that they did not purchase in the first campaign. It consists of Quest 3: Risen from the Mire, and Quest 4: At the Foundations of the World. The Quests will be delivered in a plain white tuckbox, not the retail packaging. You must back the campaign at the To The Barricades! pledge level to order this Add-on (all this content is included in the Champion and Champion + Barricades! rewards.)
We have configured our logistics system to provide the lowest average cost for all our Backers while working with trusted partners for delivery of your Rewards.
If you selected the Champion+Barricades (Expedited US Only) reward you will receive your Champion box in an expedited early shipment soon after the campaign ends. We have 1,000 units of Champion in our warehouse in the US so we will be able to send the Champion part of your Reward on an expedited timeline. We believe we can have them delivered 6 to 8 weeks after the close of the campaign. You will need to log in to your order in the Pledge Manager and provide your delivery information immediately after the campaign ends to ensure you get the fastest possible delivery.
Because this inventory is already in the United States the cost, customs issues, and complexity of shipping to non-US addresses prohibit us from delivering the expedited portion of the Reward outside the United States.
The cost to ship the Champion Reward for expedited delivery will be borne by AEG. Backers at this level will pay for shipping & handling for the rest of the Reward normally based on weight, and the rest of the Reward will ship at the same time as fulfillment of all other Reward content for this Kickstarter in 2019.

If you have any questions please email kickstarter@alderac.com.
We will be charging shipping after the Kickstarter concludes based on the actual costs incurred to ship from the closest distribution center to your delivery address. You will pay for shipping & handling in our Pledge Manager. Links to the Pledge Manager will be sent shortly after the Kickstarter campaign ends. 
Shipping costs vary widely based on where you will receive your reward.
We will ship your Rewards at our cost to our international distribution centers. Based on your delivery address we will either ship to you from our Depot in the EU, in China, in Australia or from the USA (Canada and the rest of the world).
The following chart are estimates for shipping Champion + Barricades! (including Stretch Goals) without Add-Ons. Orders that include Add-Ons will be more expensive.

We expect to use Aetherworks for fulfillment in Australia for this campaign. That is subject to change due to the advance nature of this campaign but Aetherworks is our currently preferred provider and our estimates for shipping to Australia and New Zealand reflect their cost structure.
Unfortunately, different import laws and customs from some specific countries have made it impossible for AEG to ship games to them.
WE DO NOT SHIP TO: Brazil, Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan and Afghanistan.
Alderac Entertainment Group is committed to supporting brick & mortar retail game stores. Our Kick It Here program is designed to let stores participate in the fun and excitement of a Kickstarter campaign. 
To participate in the Kick It Here program for Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon please email kickstarter@alderac.com with the name of your store, the URL of your store's website, and your store's physical address. We will reply with details about the Kick It Here Promotion.
Participating retailers agree not to sell Thunderstone Quest product received through this promotion on the internet.
Kick It Here orders are available to any brick & mortar store anywhere we ship the Kickstarter Rewards to - stores will pay actual Shipping & Handling for delivery just like regular backers.
AEG would like to thank the following experts who helped make this campaign possible: 
Mike Elliott, Original Design & Development of Thunderstone
Mike Elliott, Bryan Reese & Mark Wootton, Design & Development of Thunderstone Quest

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
At the end of the campaign we will cancel and refund any pledge of less than $50. To remain a Backer in good standing, please select a Reward of $50 or more.

All images used in this Kickstarter are subject to change and may represent unfinished or non-final art or design. All card counts are approximate and are subject to change. All card and component names are subject to change. All packaging is subject to change and is not finalized. Rules are subject to change.

Alderac Entertainment Group has been in the publishing business for more than 20 years. We are experienced at producing games in China and distributing them worldwide. Nonetheless there are always risks associated with manufacturing and logistics.

These problems can delay or otherwise impact our ability to meet our commitments to our backers.

These issues include (but are not limited to):

* Production delays 
* Shipping delays 
* Customs delays

The estimated delivery date is April 2019, but keep in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

We've done our best to minimize this as much as possible, and we are always happy to refund pledges if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered at all.

REFUND POLICY

Before the Rewards are shipped we offer no questions asked refunds. Once we have shipped your Reward our refund policy will depend on the circumstances and will be at our discretion.

At your request we can give you a full refund within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that we will subtract Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from Kickstarter after 14 days). Those fees usually equal 8% of the total pledge.

Refunds will be processed through Kickstarter and will be applied to whatever payment method you provided to Kickstarter. In the event that is impossible we will work with you to arrange a refund through other channels.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed. Not responsible for changes in the rate of foreign exchange.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By pledging to this project, you agree to conduct all public interactions via Kickstarter's communications channels with this project and our team and other backers in a positive manner. Harassment, name-calling, or attempts to inject inappropriate content into the public communications channels for the project will result in the cancellation of your pledge (with a full refund) and your ejection from the campaign. We want the communications channels for this campaign to be a friendly, positive place for our community to gather and discuss the campaign, ask questions, and provide input.

AEG reserves the right to cancel any pledge (with a full refund) at any time, for any reason. If your pledge is cancelled while the campaign is ongoing you agree not to re-pledge either under your original account or under any other account you control. Violations of this policy will be reported to Kickstarter.

Minor cosmetic damage to the box or other packaging can occur during shipping. AEG makes reasonable efforts to ensure that the shipping containers it uses are suitable for the safe delivery of the Rewards. If you believe that your Reward has suffered more than minor cosmetic damage please contact us immediately. Keep all packaging including outer cartons for our inspection. AEG will at its sole discretion determine if the damage constitutes other than minor cosmetic damage and/or was the result of insufficient packaging.

If we ship to the address that you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is returned to us as undeliverable you will pay the full cost to ship the Reward again to a revised address.

If we ship the Reward to the address you provided in our Pledge Manager and the package is delivered to that address but you are unable to receive it, or you have moved and are no longer the occupant of that address and cannot otherwise retrieve the package, or if the package is lost or stolen after delivery, and you wish to have the order fulfilled again you will pay the full cost to ship the order to a revised address plus the amount of the original Reward plus Add-Ons and other upgrades on your order.

In all cases you acknowledge that quantities are limited and AEG may not be able to ship all or part of your order more than once.

If any part of your order cannot be fulfilled for any reason AEG will provide you with a pro-rated refund for that portion of your order.

By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.

If you do not log in to our Pledge Manager and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your Reward if you contact us and confirm your pledge after the 8 week window has elapsed.

If you confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our Pledge Manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project but instead wait for the general release.

If you have questions or concerns about these terms & conditions please email kickstarter@alderac.com for further information.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Greeting Backer!
This is a very quick update to let you know that we are ready to move forward with the plan to start addressing the issue of mismatched Premium Sleeve sizes. We have just sent an email to all backers of this campaign who ordered sleeves. If you did not receive that email please contact kickstarter@alderac.com and we'll be happy to get you the needed info.
A small quantity of 1st generation sleeves will be available on Monday, July 13th at 9am (Pacific) to backers of this Kickstarter who ordered sleeves. We expect that the 1st generation sleeves we have on hand will be claimed the same day so if you want to get more 1st generation sleeves be sure you read the email and are prepared to act as soon as possible after 9am (Pacific) on Monday July 13th.

Friends,  
We are pleased to announce that Thunderstone Quest is returning to Kickstarter today June 17th at 9am (Pacific). This is the third Kickstarter for Thunderstone Quest. We’ve developed an incredible community of backers here on Kickstarter for Thunderstone and we’re very pleased to bring the next two Quests to that community today!  
In this campaign you can get the original Champion Reward featuring 5 Quests (1 Kickstarter Exclusive!), the To the Barricades! component that has two more Quests plus the Barricades Mode system for solo & co-op play, and you can back the all-new content New Horizons featuring two more Quests and the Ezuzuris’ Lair promo pack for Barricades Mode!

Thunderstone Quest: Back to the Dungeon has nearly completed delivery and we are pleased to announce that we're returning to Kickstarter in just a few weeks with the next campaign for Mike Elliott's deckbuilding game of heroic adventure!

Dear Backers,
Thunderstone Quest Back to the Dungeon is being fulfilled now and many of you have already received your Rewards!
We've had some questions about the contents. When you get your To the Barricades! component you'll be receiving a very large box - the same size as the Champion Reward!

updates.update_userinfo: Australia, New Zealand and Asia we have good news!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
Those of you who were a part of our first Adventure from Thunderstone Keep may remember that we experienced some unexpected delays delivering the Rewards from the 1st Thunderstone Kickstarter to our Champions in Australia and New Zealand.
We really didn't want a repeat of that experience this time, so we've worked with our logistics team to ensure that the Rewards would arrive at the Depot in Australia a little earlier than necessary for processing. And they did such a good job that we've been cleared to begin delivery to our Australia and New Zealand backers immediately!

updates.update_userinfo: Updated information on Reward & Late Pledge Delivery - now scheduled for May
updates.update_content:

Eclipse Second Dawn for the Galaxy is the updated core game of the space opera masterpiece from designer Touko Tahkokallio and publisher Lautapelit.fi. 
Eclipse is a "4X" game where players will command a human or alien species that explores, expands, exploits, and exterminates their way to victory. Over 8 rounds, each player will select actions to achieve their goals, carefully managing resources, engaging in epic battles with one another and the Ancients that lie in wait. Only one will guide the galaxy toward the second dawn.
This new edition features new components and thoughtfully revised content, incorporating material from former expansions to create the best possible updated version of the game. For more information about these revisions, click here.
 Review the draft rulebook here. 
Human Ship Scale for Reference
         For a comprehensive look at the revisions, please click THIS LINK.
*Art not final - Subject to Change
Please click on your desired reward level to see the shipping cost for your region. Every backer is important to us, regardless of location, but the reality is that shipping is very expensive and is a cost we all need to share. To offset this, while remaining fiscally responsible, we have included a small discount on ALL shipping, but no shipping is free.
This campaign includes Customs-Friendly delivery to the US, Canada, the UK, and the EU. Customs-Friendly means, if you live in any of these regions and have any additional charges for receiving your package, simply email kickstarter@kolossalgames.com a copy of your customs receipt and we will reimburse you via PayPal. Note: If your country is not in one of the above-mentioned regions, we cannot guarantee customs friendly shipping in these areas. (For example, Norway & Switzerland are not in the European Union.)
We have adjusted rates for the following countries: Macao, Australia, China, Israel, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Norway, New Zealand, Philippines, Russia, Singapore, Switzerland, Thailand, Turkey, Taiwan, Ukraine, Vietnam, and Hong Kong. If you live in one of these countries, please choose the desired pledge level with the title "adjusted shipping" included. 
Please note: While the U.S. is customs-friendly, there is a small possibility that tariffs for the U.S. are something that could happen in the future. This would be new for the U.S. and if it does come up we will address the impact in an update.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While Eclipse is our sixth Kickstarter project from Kolossal Games, our team has years of experience with publishing games. We have an impeccable track record of successfully delivering previous Kickstarter projects to thousands of supporters in a timely fashion--if not sooner. Our commitment to building a strong, supportive community around Kolossal Games will enable us to also deliver this project on time and with the highest quality possible.

That said, there are always complexities and considerations in a project of this scope that may cause delays. There are many steps in the process of manufacturing and fulfilling a game, many of which involve partnerships. Through careful and thorough planning, common mistakes can be avoided. However, possible delays can occur from circumstances beyond our immediate control. If such an issue is encountered, our team will adapt and no corners will be cut to course correct as needed.

Our greatest obstacle is simply the funding capital to manufacture such an ambitious product of the highest quality capable. Your contribution makes this a reality!

I also currently work as the US Sales Manager for LongPack Games Manufacturing.

When Cutie Met Patootie is 95% complete. After the campaign's successful completion, I will have the artist get to work on the Citizens of Kodiak Harbor promo cards as well as do a couple UX touchups on the graphic design of the cards. The quotes are in from LongPack Games on production, and I have multiple quotes in place for fulfillment to backers. There really isn't much left to do on the creative side to get this in your hands. Delays are part of the process, but I have built in enough lead time that I am confident we will ship the games on time or beforehand. I consider you the backer as an integral part of this project for your investment and confidence in me. I want to be as transparent as possible with you through every step of the adventure.

The Island of El Dorado is defined by the beautiful artwork which makes up its tiles, resources, and characters. Each gameplay element brings a new life and a new application to these 16th century masterpieces which were created by some of the most iconic and gifted painters in the history of visual art. Graciously opened to the public domain by the Metropolitan Museum of Art in New York City, we consider it an honor and a privilege to apply these works of indescribable beauty, mystery, and majesty to the narrative of The Island of El Dorado.
We’ve partnered with Ship Naked, a well-known fulfillment company, to deliver the most efficient shipping experience possible. They did an incredible job on our first campaign getting packages to our backers quickly and undamaged. We’ve also subsidized much of the applicable shipping and taxes to keep prices as low as possible for our backers.
We’re at the beginning of something great. El Dorado Games came to life in 2017 when Daniel Aronson, Nick Tompkins, and Michael Howard had a dream and over 4500 backers like you made it a reality. Since then, we’ve been working tirelessly on this game, this first expansion, and much, much more to pave the way for a long and exciting future of fun and engaging tabletop games.
We want you on this journey with us. The feedback we received before, during, and after the first campaign from our families, friends, and backers is a huge part of what made The Island of El Dorado what it is. We want to hear your ideas, see your islands, and know both the things you love about the game and the areas you think we could improve. Our success or failure is not our own; we’re all in this together and we want you on board!
This is a game for every kind of player. We designed this game to be something that would appeal as much to heavy gamers as it would to people who aren’t into the hobby at all. Simple rules and mechanics are combined with complex strategies and just enough luck to level the playing field. The result is an experience that’s exciting for players of any experience or skill level.
Availability is Limited. While we intend to pursue retail partnerships in the future, we’re presently using Kickstarter and Ship Naked as our only method of distribution for our games. It was astounding to see copies of our game from the first Kickstarter selling for upwards of $100 on eBay after fulfillment, and we hope that with this second printing everyone who wants to join in the fun has an opportunity to grab a copy of the game and expansion at a price less than what they’d be sold for at retail! This KS Edition will include stretch goals and higher quality finishes than what is possible in retail versions.
Every one of you is needed. We were overwhelmingly humbled and excited to see the support we received during the first Kickstarter campaign. As a result, we were able to use the funds we raised to conceive and mass produce one of the most beautiful tabletop games we’d ever seen. This absolutely would not have happened if we hadn’t had the support of so many backers, and that need remains in this new campaign. Every backer who supports us and every dollar we raise helps us to pack this game with the highest quality components and materials that we possibly can. The sky is the limit!
El Dorado Games started with three friends just trying to make a game we could play together at game night. With the success of the first Kickstarter and overwhelming positive reviews, our new goal is to bring all the fun and excitement we’ve had to friend groups around the world. We’re thankful for every single one of you and we’re excited you’re on this rollercoaster with us!
When designing The Island of El Dorado, we wanted it to be a game that our wives (who are not gamers) would actually play with us. Every decision was based on creating a great gateway game; one that hardcore gamers can bring to a casual gamer’s house to ease them into a realm of experiences involving more strategy and focus. The mechanics are simple, but the tactical decisions are complex. Casual gamers have enough quick-and-easy fun to keep them engaged and there’s just enough luck to keep a relatively level playing field. It’s the intense strategy game that your grandma can play with you…and win! If you’ve been gaming your whole life or if this is your first time with a game like this, we’ve worked hard to make The Island of El Dorado an experience you’ll love.
Still, there exists a subset of gamers who prefer their games to be entirely tactical, with little to no luck affecting the strategies they’ve put in place. We want our game to be just as much fun for these players as it is for a first-time gamer, so we’ve designed “hardcore mode”, a supplementary set of rules which shifts the dynamic and feel of the game deeper into the realm of forward-thinking, calculated strategy. Cthulhu: Death May Die is a cooperative board game for 1 to 5 players willing to take on the Cthulhu mythos like never before! Cultists are summoning one of the Elder Ones to consume our world, and it is up to the ragtag group of investigators to face the nightmarish forces and disrupt the ritual long enough to make the Elder One vulnerable. And then kill it dead.
Find out more about these Optional Buys in the following links: Season 2 Expansion, Black Goat of the Woods, Art Book, Extra Dice, Frost Dice.
Designed by Rob Daviau and Eric M. Lang, the game features monster artwork by Adrian Smith and investigator artwork by Karl Kopinski. Investigators come from all walks of life, each bringing a unique skill to the team, as well as two other generic skills.
Art by Karl Kopinski, sculpts by RN Estudio.
Madness is always at your side when battling unthinkable monstrosities from other dimensions. In fact, the investigators already start the game with a diagnosed insanity, which will will be triggered by your encounters with the occult. You may be doomed by your mental breakdown, or learn to use it to your advantage. The closer you are to losing your mind completely, the more powerful your skills will become.
Art by Filipe Pagliuso.
Summoning the Elder Gods are fanatic cultists, and the hosts of nightmarish monstrosities aiding  them in their cause. Each of these enemies possesses its own special ability and combat strength. They are not controlled by any player, but instead have their behavior triggered by Mythos cards used for each specific episode.
Art by Adrian Smith. Sculpts by Thierry Masson, Yannick Hennebo, Remy Tremblay, Michael Jenkins, Edgar Skomorowski, and Jose Roig.
The Death May Die core box contains smaller boxes that hold the modular elements to create each unique game session. Players choose one of the two available Elder Ones and combine their contents with those of one of the six available Episodes. Each of these boxes contain unique figures, tokens, and cards that are only used when playing with those elements. The Mythos deck used in each game is a combination of cards from the chosen Elder One box and the chosen Episode box. Each Episode not only indicates the map setup using the various tiles in the game, but also new actions the investigators can perform in order to accomplish the tasks required to disrupt that episode's ritual. They each also bring their own Discovery cards for players to explore, and the monsters' behaviors and abilities are tailored to each unique story.
Hastur, known as the King in Yellow, and his disciples brand the world with their terrible Yellow Sign. Those that suffer this doom quickly meet their fate by the hands of death or madness.
Art by Adrian Smith. Disciple sculpt by Thierry Masson. Hastur sculpt by JAG.
Cthulhu, The Thing That Should Not Be, will bring his sunken kingdom of R'lyeh into our world, plunging the earth into a nightmarish reality.
Art by Adrian Smith. Cthulhu sculpt by Michael Jenkins. Star Spawn sculpt by Aragorn Marks.
The Elder Ones start the game off the board; as they move along the summoning track their growing presence invites chaos and insanity into the world to accompany their grand awakening. Eventually they cross over and the real nightmare begins. If the investigators have managed to disrupt the ritual, the Elder One becomes vulnerable and may (just possibly) be killed for good. If not, the investigators now have to contend with an immortal behemoth hunting them while they try to accomplish their tasks. Either way, killing the Elder One will not be easy, not by a long shot, as each time it's bested it grows more enraged and powerful. In the end, either all investigators will fall or death will come for the Great Old One.
Investigators, Cultists, Star Spawn, Cthulhu and Hastur painted by Robert Karlsson. Byakee, Deep One, Ghoul, and Shoggoth painted by Fabrizio Russo. Cthonian, Fire Vampire, and Hunting Horror painted by Angel Giraldez. PLEASE NOTE FIGURES COME UNPAINTED.
In their mission to thwart the cultist's plans, investigators engage in more than combat. If they can get some respite, they can discover all sorts of things to potentially help them in their tasks. Discovery cards are unique to each Episode, and present the investigators with challenges or choices that will grant them different resources, companions or negative effects.
Cthulhu: Death May Die core box comes with:
45 Highly-Detailed Plastic Figures
17 Terrain Tiles
30 Plastic Tentacle Tokens
8 Custom Dice
5 Counter Bases
10 Investigator Dashboards
186 Cards
120 Tokens
1 Rulebook
WIP Rulebook
Please be aware that this is a Work In Progress Rulebook. It is not final. Rules may still be tweaked and changed, layout and graphics may still be altered. So, if you see anything in here that isn't the same later, understand that during the Kickstarter the project is still in development and all aspects are subject to improvements.
Unspeakable Pledge - $100
Backers with an Unspeakable Pledge will receive a copy of the Cthulhu: Death May Die core box, the Kickstarter Exclusive Investigator Julia, plus all applicable Stretch Goals.
Sculpt by RN Estudio. Painting by Robert Karlsson.
Julia is an incredibly level-headed investigator. Given the extraordinary circumstances she finds herself in, it's amazing how she can keep her wits about her. Her unique skill allows her to take wounds instead of stress, greatly increasing her chances of success in any given encounter. Though it may cost her life in the end...
R'lyeh Rising Pledge - $250
Backers with a R'lyeh Rising Pledge will receive a copy of the Cthulhu: Death May Die core box, the Kickstarter Exclusive R'lyeh Rising expansion, and the Kickstarter Exclusive Investigator Julia, plus all applicable Stretch Goals.
As the production of this statue is extremely expensive and time-consuming, delivery of it will be staggered. However, all backers will receive the rest of the base pledge at the same time. 
Check out THIS UPDATE for for answers to some pressing questions, extra gameplay information, and shipping cost estimates.
Let's not be coy, the heart and soul of the R'lyeh Rising expansion is its colossal figure of Cthulhu! This cyclopean creation is something never before seen in the world of board gaming. Its base is 44 x 44 cm wide, and it stands 57 cm tall to the tip of its wings. In fact, this thing is so huge that his base becomes the board on which the game is played! This plastic statue was sculpted in terrifying detail and will come pre-assembled, with the exception of the clip-on wings, so it can be proudly displayed for all to see.
Sculpt by Remy Tremblay (Julia figure included for scale).
R'lyeh Rising is a wholly unique Episode, the epic finale to Death May Die, not only bringing its own set of tokens, Discovery cards, Monster cards, and Mythos cards, but also drastic changes to the game's base rules, as the figures move and act freely upon the behemoth's rocky base.
Painting by Angel Giraldez (Cultist figures included for scale).
PLEASE NOTE ALL FIGURES COME UNPAINTED.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our 32nd Kickstarter, and there are some vagaries in terms of timing when it comes to anything produced in China, such as: 
Production delays 
Shipping delays 
Customs delays

The estimated delivery date for this project is July 2019, but keep in mind this is only an estimate. Also, due to the logistics of international shipping, backers in different regions of the world may receive their rewards sooner than others.

We've done our best to minimize this as much as possible, and we are always happy to refund pledges if for some totally unforeseen reason the game can't be delivered at all. Since the game is 90% complete, we don't believe this is in the least bit likely. We've successfully delivered Zombicide, Sedition Wars, Guilds of Cadwallon, Zombicide Season 2, Relic Knights, Rivet Wars, Kaosball, Dogs of War, Arcadia Quest, Wrath of Kings, XenoShyft, our Base System, Zombicide Season 3, The World of Smog: On Her Majesty's Service, Rum & Bones, Blood Rage, B-Sieged, Zombicide: Black Plague, The Others, XenoShyft: Dreadmire and Masmorra: Dungeons of Arcadia, Arcadia Quest: Inferno, Rum & Bones: Second Tide, Massive Darkness, The World of Smog: Rise of Moloch, Rising Sun, and Zombicide: Green Horde. A Song of Ice & Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game is currently shipping to backers.

We have three ongoing projects currently: HATE, Zombicide: Invader, and Arcadia Quest: Riders, which are in production.

Please refer to our individual project pages if you'd like to check the progress there. Each project is entirely independent from each other, has completely different development teams, and has no effect on the production flow or development of Cthulhu: Death May Die.

REFUND POLICY

We can refund you within 14 days of the campaign’s end, fees included. After that, we have a policy of no questions asked, though that’s minus Kickstarter and payment processing fees (which we can’t get back from them after 14 days). However, if we’ve begun packaging your pledge for shipment (usually 4 to 6 weeks before the actual shipping date), no refunds are possible. If a component cannot be delivered AT ALL, we refund that completely, including fees.

All refunds after the 14 days close of the campaign may be processed via Paypal or reversed via Stripe to your credit card at our discretion. Refunds within 14 days are reversed via Stripe to your credit card.

This project is being funded in USD and any refunds processed will be in USD for the exact amount received in USD, excluding any applicable fees depending on the time of the refund being processed.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By pledging to this project, you acknowledge that the final look, materials and content of the rewards (and the project) are subject to change and may differ substantially from what is presented while the Kickstarter project was active.

If you do not log in and confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email to confirm your pledge, you agree that we have fulfilled our obligations to you in full for payment or donations received. However, we may, at our discretion, refund or ship your pledge if you contact us and confirm your pledge after the 8 week window has elapsed. Unconfirmed pledges make it difficult for us to plan production and logistics, and in the past have led to project delays. For this project we do not intend to allow this to happen, which may mean if you confirm your pledge too late, exclusive items may not be produced in sufficient quantity for your pledge.

If you confirm your pledge within 8 weeks of our notification via email, you agree that our responsibility to you is to ship your order as entered into our pledge manager system, that title and risk passes to you upon delivery to a common carrier for such shipment, and you are responsible for import duties or any other duties that may be payable to the relevant tax authorities, providing correct address information and ensuring this address is deliverable by normal methods. We regret we are unable to ship to PO Boxes.

If you do not accept these terms, please do not pledge on this project.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
We hope that you're all safe and well. Since the delivery and release of Death May Die we have received incredible feedback and compliments on the game. A large portion of it comes, of course, from the amazing and diverse settings of the episodes that our Investigators have to face to outcome otherworldly evils, as well as the different set of characters and abilities.
CMON Comics - Volume 1

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
As the year ends, so does delivery of Cthulhu: Death May Die. We've received confirmation that all packages have been sent out from all hubs, so any backers still facing any issues please contact support@cmon.com
We have been ecstatic by the overwhelmingly positive feedback we've been getting from players diving into Death May Die. The reviews have been very kind, and it's just great to know that all our efforts to craft this product paid off. In the spirit of the holiday season we'd like to thank all our backers for helping make this project a reality (and for the patience with the delays we faced). We hope you play many episodes during your break, and may you actually win once in a while!

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
Deliveries of your pledges are on track to our last update. Here are the latest more precise estimates for when each Hub should send out the pledges to their backers:
 Asia Hub: Everything has already been sent out.
 Canada Hub: Already sending and should be done by November 15.
 Australia Hub: From November 18 to November 29.

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
We've just been informed that things haven't moved exactly at the speed we expected, and we'll have to wait just a little bit longer to challenge the Great Old Ones. While we're confident some backers will still receive their pledges by the end of October, the bulk of deliveries should reach backers in November and into December. Please bear with us just a smidge more!

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
Hope you're all having fun with your giant Cthulhu figures! (Yes, we know, it's bigger than you thought it would be) With the exception of a handful of stragglers, the big boy should have made its way to the hands of backers all over the globe. Not bad for something that was scheduled to finish delivering on April 2020!
Alas, every silver lining has a dark cloud. We've just been made aware that there will be some further delay in the delivery of the full Kickstarter pledges to backers. As it stands, backers should expect to start receiving their packages in late October and into November. We are truly sorry about this, as we know you are all anxious to test yourselves against the great Old Ones.

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
When dealing with Elder Gods, time behaves in strange ways. The original plan for the R’lyeh Rising expansion (which includes the giant Cthulhu figure) was to ship it to backers in batches, with the first few lucky ones getting it in July 2019 and the vast majority of less fortunate souls getting it in staggered shipments until April 2020. Well, we are very happy to inform that things are looking better. Much better! Turns out that it won’t be necessary to ship this behemoth in small batches over a period of almost a year. No, in fact this will start being sent to right now, being delivered over a period of merely a couple of months!

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
Today we'd like to show you the exclusive Frost Dice many of you added your pledge. It took us a few iterations to find the right formula for these dice. Get the black dice to show the frost effect while still being recognizably black. Get the right amount of transparency depth and subtle glittering to the plastic. In the end, we are very happy with the suitably otherworldly results obtained.

Iä! Iä! Investigators fhtagn!
We know it's been a while since the last update, and apologize for that.
While we faced no major hurdles, this project did prove to be quite a daunting one, with so many moving parts and new challenges we'd never faced before. Having so much of the game experience centered not on the core rules, but on what each Episode and Elder One brings to a session is certainly what makes this game shine, but it also means a LOT of work for every department. From custom-made rules to custom-made tokens, it's certainly been an epic journey!
